name: Haunted Fortress
description:
Move your way through the fortress, collecting keys to unlock the stairs to the next level (which will get harder). 

Enemies will cast spells on you to try and stop you so be sure to dodge them. They will also attack you if you go within 1 square of them (including diagonal).

You can possess an enemy 3 tiles away if you aren't currently possessing anyone.

If you take damage in your ghost form you die....... BUT If you get hit while possessing an enemy then they take the hit for you and you go back to ghost mode.

Move: WASD/Arrow Keys 

Haunt Enemy: Hover over with mouse and press "c"

*I definitely overscoped... sorry for no sound/animations/music!*
